items.text: Who will tell me where I can remove stretch marks? Which place do you recommend?
items.title: Removing stretch marks -where ?

items.text: Some creams, oils, and other topical skin products on store shelves claim to prevent or reduce stretch marks. Popular ingredients include cocoa butter, olive oil, and almond oil. Despite the claims on the bottle, no over-the-counter cream or oil has been proven to help prevent or treat stretch marks.
